name: Mounted Imari Vase
description: Mounted Imari Vase; Unknown; China; porcelain about 1662 - 1722; mounts about 1745 - 1749; Hard-paste porcelain, polychrome enamel decoration and gilding; gilt bronze mounts; 31.8 × 31.1 × 21.6 cm (12 1/2 × 12 1/4 × 8 1/2 in.); 72.DI.41.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Mounted Imari Vase
medium: Hard-paste porcelain, polychrome enamel decoration and gilding; gilt bronze mounts
